oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baker, J. C., 1918 April 08
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of J. C. Baker, “of Baker Station, Tennessee,” dated April 23rd, 1915. He refers to his “tract of land located on the L. & N. Railroad at Baker Station, Tennessee.” Illustrates the first page of the document. Baker’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on April 8th, 1918. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker family
